Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: GETDATE()

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: GETDATE()

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT pa.Id, p.Name, pa.ProductId, pa.Action, pa.Quantity, pa.DateCreated FROM ProductAdjustment pa INNER JOIN Products p ON p.Id = pa.ProductId WHERE pa.Id = COALESCE(@id, pa.Id) ORDER BY pa.DateCreated DESC RETURN 0

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE Id = COALESCE(@id, Id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
SELECT ISNULL(s.Name, '') SalesName, ISNULL(p.Name, '') ProductName, ISNULL(sd.Quantity, 0) Quantity, ISNULL(sd.Price, 0) Price, ISNULL(s.TotalPrice, 0) TotalPrice FROM Sales s INNER JOIN SalesDetail sd ON s.Id = sd.SalesId INNER JOIN Products p ON sd.ProductId = p.Id WHERE s.Id = COALESCE(@id, s.Id)
GROUP BY s.Name, p.Name, sd.Quantity, sd.Price, s.TotalPrice RETURN 0

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT pa.SalesDetailId, p.Name, pa.Action, pa.Quantity, pa.DateCreated FROM ProductAdjustment pa INNER JOIN Products p ON p.Id = pa.ProductId WHERE 1 = CASE WHEN @actionType = 'All' THEN 1 WHEN @actionType = 'IN' AND pa.Action = 'IN' THEN 1 WHEN @actionType = 'OUT' AND pa.Action = 'OUT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ORDER BY pa.DateCreated DESC; RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE Id = COALESCE(@id, Id) RETURN 0

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: null

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT ISNULL(sd.SalesId, '') SalesId, ISNULL(sd.ProductId, '') ProductId, ISNULL(p.Name, '') Name, ISNULL(sd.Price,0) Price, ISNULL(sd.Quantity,0) Quantity FROM SalesDetail as sd INNER JOIN Products as p ON sd.ProductId = p.Id WHERE SalesId = @id; RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT m.ModuleCode, uma.CanCreate, uma.CanEdit, uma.CanDelete, uma.CanView FROM UserModuleAccess uma INNER JOIN Module m ON uma.ModuleId = m.Id WHERE uma.UserId = @userId RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
